food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys peel me!
💛 I am a yummy fruit!
📦 I come in bunches at the store.

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. I am yummy and sweet! What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I can make you shiver!
🥄 You need this to eat me.
🍨 I come in many flavors.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees. The doctor says to eat one everyday! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I rhyme with 'dapple'.
🌳 I grow high up.
👩‍⚕️ Eating me keeps you healthy.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. I help you see in the dark! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny enjoys me.
👓 Eating me is good for your eyes.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am brown and bumpy on the outside, but white and yummy on the inside. You can mash me and eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I start with a 'P'.
🔨 You can mash me.
🍟 You can fry me, too!

food.question: I am green and grow in a pod. You can pop me out and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass.
👩‍🌾 I grow in a garden.
👪 You can eat me as a side dish.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow. I am white and good for your bones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 You can get me from a farm animal.
🥛 I am often poured into a glass.
💪 I help you grow big and strong.

food.question: I am a small, colorful candy that melts in your mouth, not in your hand. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I come in many different colors.
🍫 I have chocolate inside.
🍬 I am a type of sweet.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. You can put yummy things on me, like cheese and tomato sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into slices.
🔥 I am baked in an oven.
🇮🇹 I am a popular Italian food.

food.question: I am a fruit with a big seed inside. I have soft, orange flesh. I grow on trees in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🥭 I am very sweet.
☀️ I love warm weather.
🧡 My color is between yellow and red.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and make puddles for you to splash in. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ I make things wet.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am in the sky during the day.
💛 I am very bright.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am strong.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a sheep.
🌬️ The wind moves me.
☁️ I can bring rain.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am around.
🌨️ I am frozen water.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can move leaves.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I am air that is moving.

weather.question: Sometimes after the rain, you can see me with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
✨ I am like a colorful arch in the sky.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls like little stones. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and cold.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I fall on you.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.

weather.question: I make a bright flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be very bright.
🌩️ I come before thunder.
💥 I am a spark of electricity.

weather.question: I am a loud crashing sound that follows lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I can be very scary.
⛈️ I come after lightning.
🫕 I am the sound of the air expanding quickly.

weather.question: I am a period of very hot weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥The ground can be too hot to walk on.
💧People need to drink lots of water in me.
☀️I am a long hot period.
